name: SickDice
description:
A game where the dice is on no ones favor!

Start a random character and rush through hoarders of enemies and loot. There is only one dice for everyone, manipulate it's results to your favor!

Controls
  • Mouse for most actions (Look at the instructions on the menu at the bottom right corner)
  • R to restart your run
  • Esc to go back to the menu
